snippet: It was hard to tell where the politics ended and the party began at the Honk! festival of activist street bands in Somerville, Mass.
abstract: Honk!, a five-day festival of activist street bands in Somerville, Mass, features over 670 musicians whose raucous performances blur the line between politics and partying.
lead_paragraph: It was hard to tell where the politics ended and the party began at the Honk! festival of activist street bands in Somerville, Mass.

headline.seo: Honk! Festival of Street Bands in Somerville, Mass.
headline.main: Sending a Message by Tooting Their Horns
headline.print_headline: Sending a Message by Tooting Their Horns
